document.full_text: a texas judge has overturned a $625 million patent infringement award against apple inc, saying the jury erred in finding the maker of mac computers used technology owned by mirror worlds llc illegally.
document.title: judge overturns $625 million apple patent award
lines_and_colors: a texas judge has overturned a $625 million patent infringement award against apple inc, saying the jury erred in finding the maker of mac computers used technology owned by mirror worlds llc illegally.
